title: Microsoft Flags AI-Driven Phishing: LLM-Crafted SVG Files Outsmart Email Security
description: Microsoft is calling attention to a new phishing campaign primarily aimed at U.S.-based organizations that has likely utilized code generated using large language models (LLMs) to obfuscate payloads and evade security defenses.
